description: In the aftermath of the devastating San Marcos Quake, a massive tsunami was triggered due to the undersea seismic activity. The tsunami hit the already devastated port city of San Marcos, causing further destruction and chaos.

description: At approximately 10:30 AM, the city of San Marcos experienced a series of aftershocks originating from the San Marcos Epicenter. The aftershocks, while not as powerful as the initial earthquake, caused further damage to the already devastated city.

A1_ppt_ground_shaken.name: San Marcos Epicenter
